title: Turbot cooked in coconut milk, frozen lettuce and confit English asparagus
description: You’ll need to get hold of ice lettuce (ficoïde glaciale) and lemon balm or lemon verbena herb for this recipe, but it’s well worth seeking out these unusual ingredients for this lightly spiced fish supper.
ingredients: 1 bunch ice lettuce (known as ficoïde glaciale in France)
1 sprig lemon balm or lemon verbena
6 spears English green asparagus, woody ends removed
